recipes.title: Recipes Website
recipes.description: This was a web project developed during the Web Frontend bootcamp at Campinho Digital. The goal was to create a themed recipe website to display dishes, using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modular file organization.
recipes.features: The site features an attractive interface with banners, illustrative images, and dedicated pages for different recipes. Each recipe has its own page with detailed information and a customized layout. The project also includes navigation buttons for easy access between the main sections and recipes, as well as an interactive search bar to make browsing even more intuitive.
recipes.structure: Additionally, the codebase is structured for easy maintenance and style reuse, with multiple CSS files and organized asset folders.

reencontrow.title: Reencontrow Website
reencontrow.description: Reencontrow is a modern web application developed with React and Vite, featuring a clean interface. The project emphasizes component-based architecture, with reusable layout components and organized asset management.
reencontrow.features: The website showcases visually appealing sections, including banners and thematic images, all styled using Sass (SCSS) for modular and maintainable stylesheets. The design was taken from Figma, ensuring a professional visual identity aligned with current trends.
reencontrow.structure: The codebase is structured for scalability, with separate folders for components, styles, and assets, ensuring easy maintenance and future enhancements.
